scripts.lint: npm run frontend:lint && npm run backend:lint
scripts.format: cargo fmt --all && cd frontend && npm run format
scripts.check: npm run frontend:check && npm run backend:check
scripts.dev: export FRONTEND_PORT=$(node scripts/setup-dev-environment.js frontend) && export BACKEND_PORT=$(node scripts/setup-dev-environment.js backend) && concurrently "npm run backend:dev:watch" "npm run frontend:dev"
scripts.backend:dev: BACKEND_PORT=$(node scripts/setup-dev-environment.js backend) npm run backend:dev:watch
scripts.backend:dev:watch: DISABLE_WORKTREE_ORPHAN_CLEANUP=1 RUST_LOG=debug cargo watch -w crates -x 'run --bin server'
scripts.dev:qa: export FRONTEND_PORT=$(node scripts/setup-dev-environment.js frontend) && export BACKEND_PORT=$(node scripts/setup-dev-environment.js backend) && concurrently "npm run backend:dev:watch:qa" "npm run frontend:dev"
scripts.remote:dev: cd crates/remote && docker compose --env-file .env.remote up --build ; docker compose down -v
